articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Seek Way out of Crisis in Provocations against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Seek Way out of Crisis in Provocations against DPRK Blasted
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday in connection with the fact that traitor Park Geun Hye is trying hard to seek a way out of the worst crisis in provocations against the DPRK:
					 Traitor Park has been thrown into an inescapable predicament following the outbreak of "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal", the hideous power-backed scandal unprecedented in history, and the detailed disclosure of the truth behind it.
					
					 The mass struggle of the enraged south Korean people is mounting as the days go by and Park is standing at the crossroads of whether to quit power of her own accord or face impeachment.
					
					 What matters is that Park is trying hard to seek a way out of the current crisis in political and military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the trite method employed by the south Korean puppet forces to divert elsewhere the attention of the world public through confrontation and war racket against the DPRK whenever they faced a catastrophic phase caused by their unpopular and traitorous rule.
					
					 A typical example was the tragicomedy that followed the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 When Sewol was sinking in April 2014 and hundreds of drowning pupils were crying for help in cold sea water, Park was spending time together with the ex-husband of Choe Sun Sil for seven hours. This is an open secret.
					
					 Thrown into the unprecedented crisis by the waves of fierce movement for "impeachment of Park Geun Hye" sweeping across south Korea, she hurled military warmongers into recklessly opening fire at naval warships of the DPRK side on their routine guard duty in the waters along the extension of the military demarcation line in the West Sea of Korea and even went so hysterical as to call latrine door its drone.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the recent worst crisis facing Park, the puppet forces staged all forms of joint military exercises while vociferating about "provocation from north Korea" at confabs held with their U.S. master every day. They are also busy introducing U.S. strategic nuclear submarines equipped with nuclear warhead missiles. This is by no means accidental.
					
					 As was disclosed recently, Park, believing in the "collapse" timetable crafted by a green shaman in a back parlor, senselessly resorted to extreme confrontation moves against the DPRK such as total suspension of the north-south relations only to be forsaken by everybody. Under such situation no one can vouch that she would not take another reckless action.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK keep tabs on all the crimes committed by the Park group which has done wrongs only against the DPRK since its seizure of power. They are fully determined to make a thousand-fold revenge on Park if she dares provoke the DPRK in order to survive.
					
					 Whoever chimes in with the Park group, failing to discern its last resort made while rushing headlong into ruin, will only face shame and disgrace.

articles.title: New DPRK Ambassador to UK Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Ambassador to UK Appointed
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Choe Il was appointed as DPRK ambassador to the UK, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: North-South Joint Event Held in Harbin, China
articles.content:
North-South Joint Event Held in Harbin, China
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Catholic Association of Korea and the Society for Commemorating Martyr An Jung Gun of south Korea held an anti-Japanese joint event in Harbin, China from Oct. 25 to 27 on the occasion of the 107th anniversary of martyr An Jung Gun's assassination of Hirobumi Ito, the chieftain of the Japanese imperialists' aggression of Korea.
					 At the joint event, both sides said that An Jung Gun's assassination of Hirobumi Ito was a patriotic deed that demonstrated to the world the Korean people's will not to live as colonial slaves of outside forces, denounced Japan for bringing unspeakable misfortune and pain to the Korean nation and decided to carry on the joint struggle to force Japan to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes and frustrate the moves to distort history and launch reinvasion.
					
					 They decided to pool efforts and wage a positive struggle to reject the anti-reunification forces' confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and war moves blocking the nation's reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification, improve the north-south relations and achieve the country's reunification under the banner of the national independence and the great national unity.
					
					 In particular, they decided to firmly preserve the north-south joint declarations in the drive to achieve peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula and develop the north-south relations, and make joint efforts for successfully holding the great meeting for reunification with the people from all walks of life in the north, the south and abroad involved as an immediate task.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Dinh Nhu Hoan visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Thursday.
					 The guests paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Dinh Nhu Hoan visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The members of the delegation visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum which displays the historical materials and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members.
					
					 At the old home, they looked round historical relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the fact that the President was born at the low-roofed thatched house and grew up while cultivating ardent patriotism and the noble intention of the revolution. 
					
					 They toured the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They visited the Sci-Tech Complex, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: Go-players of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
Go-players of DPRK Back Home
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK go-players came back home Thursday after taking part in the 2016 Shanglu Cup Hangzou International City Go Tournament which took place in China from Oct. 27 to 30.
					 It brought together men and women players of 33 teams of more than ten countries including the DPRK, Malaysia and Canada and regions.
					
					 Ham Un Gyong bagged a gold cup in the women's singles and Ham and Jang Ri Gyong won silver medals in the women's doubles. 
					
					 The DPRK team took the first place in the women's team standing.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Achievements in DPRK
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Achievements in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 27th national exhibition of IT achievements took place in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Displayed there were more than 1 300 application programs for operating systems, which were developed by the economy, education, sports, public health and other sectors of the country.
					
					 They include 100-odd IT achievements and new technologies and products presented by the State Academy of Sciences and a tele-questioning and answering system on farming techniques and a scientific farming guidance system based on real-time meteorological information by the Ministry of Agriculture.
					
					 There are also scores of programs developed by Kim Il Sung University and Korea University of Physical Education to contribute to turning the country into a sports powerhouse.
					
					 What drew the attention of visitors at the exhibition were programs coded by teen-agers from Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 and other secondary schools.
					
					 The exhibition is of great help to developing the nation's information science and technology.

articles.title: 27th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Closes
articles.content:
27th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Closes
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 27th national exhibition of IT achievements was closed with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Thursday. 
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were IT products presented by Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Institute of IT Science and Technology under the State Academy of Sciences and other educational institutions and units developing programs.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and program developers.

articles.title: Schoolchildren in Flood-afflicted Areas of North Hamgyong Province Continue Camping
articles.content:
Schoolchildren in Flood-afflicted Areas of North Hamgyong Province Continue Camping
Wonsan, November 3 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren in the flood-afflicted areas of the northern part of North Hamgyong Province started again the camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 The ceremony for starting the camping took place on Thursday.
					
					 All the campers and teachers laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Songdowon International Children's Camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, and other officials, campers and teachers of the camp. 
					
					 A reporter and speakers expressed emotions and happiness for enjoying camping in the Songdowon International Children's Camp thanks to the benevolence of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Un, who called them to the camp to relieve them from sorrow, is the real father of all the children of the country. 
					
					 They said they would solidify the knowledge learnt at the school and train themselves sound body and mind through colorful activities.
					
					 There took place an art performance given by the teachers of the camp for the campers on the same day.

articles.title: Iron Ore Production Rises at Musan Mining Complex of DPRK
articles.content:
Iron Ore Production Rises at Musan Mining Complex of DPRK
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Musan Mining Complex in the DPRK boosts the iron ore production though it was hit hard by flooding.
					 According to data available, it has doubled the output since its recovery from the flood damage.
					
					 Employees of the complex restored a large-scale pumping station and a drilling-head branch factory and removed a great deal of mud and muck to put the iron ore production on a normal track.
					
					 They also repaired many equipment and facilities to make a breakthrough for the increased production.

articles.title: WPK's Lines and Policies Are Guidelines for Victories: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPK's Lines and Policies Are Guidelines for Victories: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The scientific accuracy, truth, attraction and viability of the lines and policies set forth in the report to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) are the victorious guidelines as they embody the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and reflect the requirements of the stage of making leap forward in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the aspiration of the Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The party's lines and policies serve as the important programmes for victoriously advancing the revolution, an encyclopedia giving perfect answers to all problems arising in revolutionary practices and a powerful weapon helping firmly consolidate the driving force of the Korean revolution, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The general line of socialist construction on dynamically conducting the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, while consolidating the people's power and enhancing its function and role, the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, the line of self-development-first principle and other strategic lines and policies reflect the fixed faith and will of the WPK to win the final victory of the revolution along the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by the great leaders.
					
					 The party's lines and policies serve as an all-purpose textbook for the revolution and construction as they clarify detailed tasks and ways of building a powerful socialist country including the issue of putting the overall science and technology on a cutting-edge basis, strengthening the self-supporting and Juche character of the economy and the issue of developing the country's economy with science and technology as basic productivity as required by the developing reality while augmenting the politico-military might.
					
					 The Korean revolution is making steady progress without the slightest marking time or stagnation despite the unprecedented difficulties and ordeal in history thanks to the party's lines and policies which indicate the correct path for strengthening the Juche-based driving force of the revolution.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Will End in Bitter Failure: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Will End in Bitter Failure: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. Secretary of State Kerry let out such invective as "illegal" in reference to the DPRK.
					 Bosses of the three services of the U.S. forces huddled together recently to call for taking a "posture for countering" possible "threats" from the DPRK during the regime change in the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary says this is nothing but rubbish talked by those who are more dead than alive as they find themselves in a poor position where they have to leave the jobs unfulfilled to the next administration after suffering miserable setbacks in the political and military stand-off with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK remains unperturbed by any wild act, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations could not escape the fate of loser in the decades-long stand-off with the DPRK. This is the truth taught by history.
					
					 The U.S. is grumbling that peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the Asia-Pacific region are being disturbed, citing "threat" from someone, but this is the sheer distortion of reality and sophism of gangsters and hideous tricksters making profound confusing of the right and the wrong in a bid to evade the responsibility for having compelled Juche Korea to emerge a nuclear power by posing ceaseless nuclear threat to the DPRK and blackmailing it for more than half a century.
					
					 The U.S. is still making desperate efforts to bring down the DPRK but this will only encourage it to bolster up its might before the world. 
					
					 The U.S. is fated to suffer a defeat in the confrontation with the DPRK just as it did in the past.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces for Tightening Military Nexus with U.S., Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces for Tightening Military Nexus with U.S., Japan
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group of traitors held a "meeting of joint chiefs of staff" with its American and Japanese masters in Washington recently at which they discussed the matter of boosting "defence cooperation" and joint military drills to stifle the DPRK by force of arms under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threats" from it.
					 On October 22 the south Korean puppet forces staged a madcap joint naval drill with the U.S. and Japan aimed at a preemptive strike at the DPRK with lots of warships and aggressor forces involved.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary says that this is a product of reckless and ridiculous confrontational racket of the puppet group designed to pursue confrontation with the DPRK at any cost even with the backing of their American and Japanese masters as it has been taken aback by the DPRK's stepped-up measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defence. The commentary continues:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet group of traitors is openly tightening the military conspiracy and nexus with Japan under the backstage manipulation of the U.S., pursuant to its scenario.
					
					 Such military nexus of the puppet group with Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, is a hideous act of emboldening Japan's moves for becoming a military giant and launching reinvasion and of bringing the danger of a war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is made up of modern-day traitors as cursed as "five traitors in 1905" because they do not hesitate to join hands even with the above-said enemy if this helps stifle the fellow countrymen and achieve "unification of social systems".
					
					 The harder the Park group works to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK with the backing of outsiders, the further the latter will bolster up  its nuclear deterrence for self-defence in quality and quantity and this will only precipitate the destruction of the aggressors and the provocateurs.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Ruling Party Placed in Dilemma by Its Internal Disunion
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Ruling Party Placed in Dilemma by Its Internal Disunion
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- It seems the south Korean puppet ruling party is likely to collapse because of the scandal of monopoly of administration sparked off by Park Geun Hye.
					 41 lawmakers who do not belong to the pro-Park Geun Hye circles including the former representative of the "Saenuri Party" on Oct. 31 held an emergency meeting in the assembly hall and decided to sign the written statement to demand the reshuffle of the party leadership body and to call for probing the truth behind the case of the "Choe Sun Sil Gate." 
					
					 Over 60 lawmakers signed the statement and some of them were pro-Park lawmakers.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigation into Choe Sun Sil's Entry into Chongwadae
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigation into Choe Sun Sil's Entry into Chongwadae
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kukmin Ilbo in an editorial on Nov. 2 said it has been disclosed by media that Choe Sun Sil known as heavyweight of the "president" frequently went in and out of Chongwadae without examination at checkpoints.
					 If it is true, this means that Chongwadae deceived the people once again, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 In order to probe the truth, Chongwadae should submit records of entry, etc. to the prosecution.
					
					 The prosecution should analyze the data of watch camera installed at the main gate of Chongwadae and survey the former and incumbent guard chiefs.

articles.title: S. Korean People Stage Actions against Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean People Stage Actions against Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life are steadily staging various forms of actions to judge Park Geun Hye, according to reports.
					 On Oct. 1 and 2, students of Jonnam University and professors of Kangwon University in the declarations on the situation said that Park Geun Hye is not "president" and should stop acting the puppet.
					
					 Earlier, students, graduates and teachers of Hansin University in a joint declaration on the situation noted that the Park regime's act is an indelible insult to many martyrs who fought for independence and democracy of south Korea.
					
					 The Taejon headquarters of the movement for defending democracy held a candlelight action of citizens in Taejon.
					
					 On Oct. 31, organizations including the emergency situation measure council of media organizations and more than 60 civic and pubic organizations in south Korean Kangwon Province and 261 organizations in South Jolla Province held press conferences.
					
					 Labor movement organizations decided to stage a joint action to urge Park Geun Hye to step down and entered into a strike on the situation outside the building of the puppet government from Nov. 1.
					
					 Meanwhile, opposition parties have strengthened protest actions.
					
					 The Minju Party on Oct. 1 held a gathering of the people to probe the truth behind "Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil Gate" at the "National Assembly".
					
					 The floor leaders of the Minju Party, the Kukmin Party and the Jongui Party met at the NA and named the "Choe Sun Sil Gate" after "Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil Gate" and discussed the orientation of action including the investigation of prosecution and the enforcement of inspection into the administration for probing the suspicions.
					
					 On Oct. 2, traitor Park conducted partial reshuffle including the informal designation of a new "prime minister". The opposition parties branded this as an act aimed to turn the situation in her favor, preserve the power and turned down the hearing of the NA related to the reshuffle.
					
					 The Seoul mayor denounced the unilateral announcement of the reshuffle list as an act of mocking the people.
					
					 On Oct. 31, the puppet prosecution authorities arrested Choe Sun Sil and took her to the Seoul detention house in the face of strong protest by the people from all walks of life.

articles.title: Halt to Introduction of "State-compiled History Textbooks" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Introduction of "State-compiled History Textbooks" Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that the maternal uncle of Cha Un Thaek, confident of Choe Sun Sil, was the core member of the staff of Chongwadae who pressed ahead with the "system of introducing the state-compiled history textbooks".
					 Angered by this, historians and educators are issuing statements in succession and demanding an immediate halt to the introduction of the above-said system.
					
					 On November 1, 47 societies of historians held a press conference in Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul at which the participants issued a declaration on the situation demanding the present regime thoroughly investigate the monopolization of administration and immediately stop the introduction of "state-compiled history textbooks" pushing back the education of history.

articles.title: Inhumane and Undemocratic Education System Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Inhumane and Undemocratic Education System Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye, the Teachers Union of south Korea on October 31 held a press conference in Seoul to denounce the unjust behavior of the puppet Ministry of Education.
					 The organization made public the declaration signed by more than 13 330 teachers across south Korea and issued a press release.
					
					 It said that the teacher-estimation system pushed forward by the Ministry of Education is an inhumane system going against education.
					
					 It noted that the teachers will struggle against them with conscience and enthusiasm for genuine education.
					
					 It urged the Ministry of Education to withdraw at once the teacher-estimation system aimed to oppress and control teachers by the theory of competition.

articles.title: Spokesman for Federation of Koreans in U.S. Calls for Punishment of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Spokesman for Federation of Koreans in U.S. Calls for Punishment of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a commentary on Nov. 1 said that a lot of suspicions about the abnormal administration were cleared after the disclosure of the fact that Park Geun Hye was wire-pulled by Choe Sun Sil behind the scene. 
					 The commentary went on:
					
					 Syngman Rhee and other sycophantic traitors took powers and disturbed administration and pursued dictatorial politics in south Korea after the liberation. But history does not know such arbitrary politics of Park controlled by a shaman.
					
					 The commentary stressed the need to force Park Geun Hye to step down and face punishment by the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on Oct. 27.
					 Lebedev, chief of the group, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Oct. 27 to Dec. 19 and decided to present a message to Kim Jong Un and lay a floral basket before an art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and widely organize the activities introducing the sacred career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nigeria
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for Remembering HE Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on October 27.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly hold political and cultural events praising the undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and introducing successes made by the Korean army and people in the drive for the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was posted on the Russian website Irkutskblogspot. Ru on Oct. 27.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decade-long history of the WPK is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays in October Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays in October Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- An international body and Spanish organizations for the study of the Juche idea posted special articles on their websites from Oct. 4 to 10 on the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 71st founding anniversary. 
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in an article titled "Eternal leader of WPK" illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il said he is the great man who strengthened the leadership role of the WPK and victoriously led the Korean revolution despite all ordeals and difficulties of history.
					
					 The Vasco Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain posted on its website articles titled "Spirit of leader Kim Jong Un," "Invincible WPK" and "Party serving people" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain in articles titled "The great party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" and "Kim Jong Un, chairman of WPK" praised Kim Il Sung for building the WPK and Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of the leader and the guiding force of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The Valencia Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain in articles titled "Promise of leader Kim Jong Un" and "Party which formed harmonious whole with popular masses" said that he is developing the WPK into the steel-like vanguard advancing with the might of idea and unity and the genuine mother party devotedly serving the people.

articles.title: Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held at the Russian embassy here Thursday on the occasion of the Day of People's Unity.
					 Present there were media persons, staff members of the Russian Eembassy and a TASS reporter.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, spoke at the conference.
					
					 He said that the integration of Crimea was made in full conformity with the requirement of international law through democratic procedures by the referendum. He referred to the unreasonableness of the U.S. and other West's sanctions on Russia.
					
					 The questions raised were answered. 
					
					 A Russian documentary film was shown.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente libanes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente libanes 
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica del Libano, Michel Aoun. 
					En su misiva, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en los trabajos responsables del destinatario por la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais y manifesto la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo espanol
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo espanol
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju envio el 31 de octubre un mensaje de felicitacion a Mariano Rajoy Brey por su reeleccion como premier del Reino de Espana.
					En su misiva, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en los trabajos responsables del destinatario para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Gran Bretana
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Gran Bretana
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Choe Il fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Gran Bretana.

articles.title: Portavoz del Instituto del MINREX critica a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz del Instituto del MINREX critica a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 3 en relacion con que la traidora Park Geun-hye, empantanada en la peor crisis, busca la salida en los actos provocadores contra la RPDC, el portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					La traidora Park Geun-hye se va hundiendo en el atolladero sin salida a medida que se revelan uno tras otro los detalles del "escandalo Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil" acompanado del abuso del poder, sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Ante la escalada de la lucha masiva de la poblacion surcoreana montada en colera, ella se encuentra en la disyuntiva de retirarse o ser expulsada del poder.
					
					El problema es que la traidora quiere buscar la salida de la actual crisis en la provocacion politica-militar contra la RPDC.
					
					Es un metodo rutinario de los titeres surcoreanos armar la campana de enfrentamiento y guerra anti-RPDC para distraer la atencion de la humanidad, cada vez que caen en la coyuntura catastrofica debido a su gobernacion antipopular y antinacional.
					
					Se puede citar como ejemplo la tragicomedia vista despues del accidente del ferry "Sewol".
					
					Ya es un hecho conocido que en abril de 2014 cuando cientos de alumnos pequenos pedian el socorro desde el barco en hundimiento y se ahogaban en aguas frias, Park Geun-hye permanecio 7 horas en la cama con el ex marido de Choe Sun Sil.
					
					Al ver que se tomaba auge por doquier del Sur de Corea el movimiento para la "dimision de Park", esta instigo a los belicistas militares a abrir el fuego contra los buques de fuerzas navales de la RPDC, que cumplian la mision de patrulla rutinaria en la linea de demarcacion del Mar Oeste de Corea, y hasta escenifico el episodio histerico de insistir en que la puerta de un bano es un resto del drone norcoreano.
					
					Coincidiendo con la peor crisis de ahora, los titeres surcoreanos se reunen repetidamente con su amo norteamericano hablando de la "provocacion del Norte de Corea", libran los ejercicios militares conjuntos de diferentes tipos e introducen hasta el submarino estrategico estadounidense dotado del misil con ojiva nuclear. Este hecho no es nada casual.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que Park no cometa otra locura, si se toma en cuenta su situacion actual entre la espada y la pared y su conducta ilogica de haber lanzado la extremada campana conflictiva con la RPDC como romper totalmente las relaciones intercoreanas creyendo el llamado cronograma de "derrumbe" inventado por la bruja mentora (Choe) en su oficina secreta.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC tienen en cuenta todos los crimenes de la camarilla de Park, que viene dedicandose a la campana contra la parte connacional cometiendo maldades desde su llegada al poder hasta la fecha, y estan dispuestos a castigarla rotundamente si ella incurre en otro acto provocador para salvarse.
					
					Sufrira la verguenza e ignominia cualquier persona que se sume a la ultima jugada de la banda de Park que se va arruinando.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto conjunto N-S en Harbin
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto conjunto N-S en Harbin
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 107 de la ejecucion de Hirobumi Ito, caudillo de la agresion imperialista japonesa a Corea, por el martir An Jung Gun, la Asociacion de Catolicos de Corea y el Consejo Memorial del Martir An Jung Gun sostuvieron del 25 al 27 de octubre en Harbin, China, un acto conjunto antijapones.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes evaluaron que la liquidacion de Hirobumi Ito por el martir An fue una conducta patriotica que demostro a todo el mundo que la nacion coreana no desea vivir como colonia de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Condenaron los crimenes de Japon que impuso a la nacion coreana incontables desgracias y sufrimientos.
					
					Acordaron obligar a Japon a disculparse e indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado y luchar en conjunto contra la tergiversacion de la historia y las acciones para la reagresion del pais isla.
					
					Decidieron rechazar las maniobras belicas y de confrontacion fratricida de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion que se oponen a la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y a la paz y reunificacion, mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas bajo la bandera de independencia y gran unidad nacionales y unir las fuerzas para dinamizar la lucha por la reintegracion de la patria. 
					
					Coincidieron en mantener y ejecutar cabalmente las declaraciones conjuntas N-S para realizar la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana y desarrollar las relaciones N-S y ante todo, esforzarse juntos por la apertura exitosa de la gran reunion por la reunificacion en que tomen parte los habitantes de diferentes sectores del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar.

articles.title: Regresan jugadoras coreanas de go-chess
articles.content:
Regresan jugadoras coreanas de go-chess
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Regresaron el dia 3 las jugadoras coreanas que habian tomado parte en el Torneo de Go-chess de la Ciudad Internacional de Hangzou por la Copa Shanglu 2016.
					En el evento, efectuado del 27 al 30 de octubre en China, participaron los jugadores de ambos sexos de 33 equipos provenientes de mas de 10 paises y regiones, inclusive la RPDC, Malasia y Canada.
					
					En el juego femenino individual, Ham Un Gyong conquisto un trofeo dorado y en el doble femenino, la medalla de plata con su compatriota Jang Ri Gyong. 
					
					El equipo coreano logro situarse en el primer lugar en el ranking de colectivos femeninos.

articles.title: Entidades juveniles y estudiantiles del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar publican resolucion conjunta
articles.content:
Entidades juveniles y estudiantiles del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar publican resolucion conjunta
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Subcomision de los Jovenes y Estudiantes del Comite Norteno, la Direccion de Jovenes y Estudiantes del Comite Sureno y el Comite Preparatorio del Comite de Jovenes y Estudiantes del Comite Ultramarino, por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, hicieron publica el dia 3 una resolucion conjunta.
					Ya pasaron 87 anos desde cuando los jovenes y estudiantes coreanos emprendieron la lucha antijaponesa en Kwangju protestando a la cruel dominacion colonial de los imperialistas japoneses y sus insultos y maltratos a las estudiantes coreanas, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Este incidente fue la explosion de la colera acumulada contra Japon, que ocupo ilegalmente el territorio coreano y practico la cruel dominacion colonial contra el pueblo coreano causandole los sufrimientos y desgracias de toda indole, y fue una justa lucha patriotica para rescatar la libertad, la independencia y la dignidad nacional. 
					
					Hoy en dia, Japon no reflexiona sobre sus crimenes del pasado, ni pide perdon por el respecto, sino insulta todavia a la nacion coreana tergiversando y negando cinicamente su historia de agresion. 
					
					En particular, muestra abiertamente su intento de usurpar el islote coreano Tok y da acicate a las maniobras por la rehabilitacion del militarismo y la nueva agresion. Y al mismo tiempo, intensifica la persecucion politica y represion contra los coreanos residentes en Japon e impide perversamente la reunificacion de Corea, deseada tanto por todos los coreanos. 
					
					En particular, provoca gran indignacion de los jovenes y estudiantes dentro y fuera del pais la actitud projaponesa y vendepatria de las autoridades surcoreanas que toleran los crimenes del pasado de Japon y abren el camino de nueva agresion a los reaccionarios japoneses. 
					
					Primero, lucharemos hasta el final por cobrar el perdon y la indemnizacion de Japon que agredio a Corea y perpetro toda clase de crimenes contra la nacion coreana.
					
					Segundo, rechazaremos rotundamente las maniobras de Japon encaminadas a tergiversar la historia, usurpar el islote Tok, resucitar el militarismo y emprender la nueva agresion. 
					
					Tercero, frustraremos tajantemente las maniobras de represion de los reaccionarios japoneses contra los compatriotas residentes en Japon. 
					
					Cuarto, dinamizaremos el movimiento patriotico por la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la patria bajo la bandera de la independencia nacional y la gran unidad nacional. 
					
					Quinto, respaldaremos activamente con el proyecto de la realizacion de gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion, que causa un gran apoyo en el interior y exterior del pais, y prepararemos en la delantera la nueva fase trascendental de reunificacion de la patria al llevar a feliz termino el gran acto de jovenes coreanos por la reunificacion en que participaran ampliamente los jovenes y estudiantes de diversos estratos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar. 
					
					Para ese fin, sostendremos en la segunda quincena del noviembre o en el tiempo que se acordara el contacto de trabajo de los delegados de los jovenes y estudiantes del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar para discutir los problemas generales y practicos a fin de promover ese gran conclave por la reintegracion de la patria.
					
					Al finalizar, la nota exhorto a todos los jovenes y estudiantes dentro y fuera del pais a lograr sin falta el gran acto de jovenes coreanos por la reunificacion y movilizarse como un solo hombre en el movimiento patriotico por abrir el ancho camino de la paz y la reunificacion de la patria.
